Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: July 2002
12.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
01.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (BREM)
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
19.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Chenged initial mode if there is no row in ADMU
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CTRY
15.09.2004 SH SCR6967 Added new fields BANK_REFINANCE_NAME,......
13.05.2003 JJ SCR3534 -Changed "only active" range of BrowseBFDE
-Fixed use of v.RadioRangeOnlyActive as allowed values for radio button
30.04.2003 JJ SCR3430 added ledger names to screen
30.04.2003 JJ SCR3406 -Changed handling "only active" range
-"New" action in Mainscreen now triggers new in child
-added update of button labels to task suffix of child task...
For some reason an update in any other place retuns the labels to blank
If exited from create mode (with no rows in range)
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
23.10.2002 JJ SCR2419 -added event + handling for refresh of BrowseBFDE
-Added expression handler for change of radio button
22.10.2002 JJ added Read/update of BREM
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
checkbox is not modifiable in query mode (only choice control without option)
therefore use radio button instead
Update button varaibles with labels .. else they show as blank
(some kind of magical logic)
